title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.9 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.9 - Reporting

State Regulations
(a) Eligible
applicants participating in the Industrial Infrastructure Development Program
shall submit quarterly and annual project reports as prescribed by the
department which shall contain, but not be limited to, a discussion and
analysis of the progress of the eligible project, and such other information as
the department deems pertinent to evaluating the status of the
project. (b) Eligible applicants
participating in the Industrial Infrastructure Development Program shall submit
quarterly and annual financial reports in a form prescribed by the department
which shall set forth receipts and expenditures of funds pursuant to the

Industrial Infrastructure Development Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
60.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
